## Skill Icons

**Showcase your skills on your GitHub or resumé with ease!**

[![ref-repo]](https://github.com/tandpfun/skill-icons)
[![ref-official-doc]](https://github.com/tandpfun/skill-icons?tab=readme-ov-file#docs)

### Parameters

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-querys] | | | | | |
| `i` | `string` | `true` |  | Specifying Icons | Multiple icons can be specified using `,` separator, e.g. `i=js,html,css`, Please refer to [Icons List](https://github.com/tandpfun/skill-icons?tab=readme-ov-file#icons-list) for icon names. |
| `theme` | `string` |  | `dark` | Themed Icons | Supported: `light` `dark`. |
| `perline` | `number` |  | `15` | Number of icons per line | Range: `1` to `50`. |

</details>

```txt
https://skillicons.dev/icons{?i,theme,perline}
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Back%20to%20top-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### Examples

```markdown
![Skills](https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=aws,gcp,azure,react,vue,flutter&perline=3)
```

<div>
  <img src="https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=aws,gcp,azure,react,vue,flutter&#38;perline=3" alt="Skills" />
</div>
